comments:
Created an attachment (id=83186)
demo project setup with two perspectives

Build ID: I20071101-2000

Steps To Reproduce:
1. create a simple RCP plugin with two perspectives
2. make the perspective bar visible
3. run the RCP application
4. change perspective won't work
5. add "org.eclipse.ui.ide" dependency to the launch config
6. change perspective will work now


More information:
The exception, if the "org.eclipse.ui.ide" dependency is missing.
